name: PATH_DISC_COMP_CMT
description: PATHWAY_DISC_CMT table contains comments for discontinuing and completing a patient pathway.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient pathway record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DISC_COMPL_COMMENT
columns.description: Comments for discontinuing or completing the pathway
